title: Know, Learn, Teach and Do. How Marklogic has been used at the RSC to enhance the discoverability and integration of content across its diverse audiences
abstract: RSC invested in Marklogic in 2009 and in 2010 launched a platform to deliver its journal, books and databases in a single integrated discovery engine. Following the success of this the RSC reviewed its educational materials and has implemented a new platform to enable teachers and students with the discovery of education resources. Using the sprint method to develop these products has enabled the RSC to further evolve and develop these applications. After a review of the RSC portfolio of assets across all its platforms the next stage of evolvement is to leverage the Big Data concept across all Chemical Science content and services (inc. personalisation and social) and deliver a unique and competitive experience to its community.

speakers.name: Will Russell
speakers.title: Manager of Innovation and Product Development
